targets.expr:
# saved income
(
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"revenue:.*"}[30d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[30d])
    ) by(target_currency)
    * -1

    - on(target_currency)
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"expenses:.*"}[30d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[30d])
    ) by(target_currency)
)

/ on (target_currency)

# net income
(
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"revenue:.*"}[30d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[30d])
    ) by(target_currency)
    * -1

    - on(target_currency)
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account="expenses:Taxes:Income"}[30d])
        ) by (currency)
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[30d])
    ) by(target_currency)
)

# total available cash and emergency fund
sum(
    sum(
        last_over_time(hledger_balance{account=~"assets:cash:.*"}[1d])
    ) by(currency) 
    * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
) by(target_currency)

/ on (target_currency)

# average daily expense
(
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"expenses:.*",account!="expenses:Taxes:Income"}[365d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
    ) by(target_currency)
    /
    365
)

# total available cash and emergency fund
sum(
    sum(
        last_over_time(hledger_balance{account=~"assets:.*|libilities:.*",account!~"assets:pension:.*"}[1d])
    ) by(currency) 
    * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
) by(target_currency)

/ on (target_currency)

# average daily expense
(
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"expenses:.*",account!="expenses:Taxes:Income"}[365d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
    ) by(target_currency)
    /
    365
)

# saved income
(
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"revenue:.*"}[30d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[2d])
    ) by(target_currency)
    * -1

    - on(target_currency)
    sum(
        sum(
            sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"expenses:.*"}[30d])
        ) by (currency) 
        * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[2d])
    ) by(target_currency)
)

/ on(target_currency)

# net income
(
  sum(
    sum(
      sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account=~"revenue:.*",}[30d])
    ) by (currency)
    * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
  ) by(target_currency) * -1
  - on (target_currency)
  sum(
    sum(
      sum_over_time(hledger_transactions{account="expenses:Taxes:Income"}[30d])
    ) by (currency)
    * on(currency) last_over_time(hledger_fx_rate{target_currency="$target_currency"}[1d])
  ) by(target_currency)
)

Nordea 1 - Emerging Stars Equity BP SEK
Nordea 1 - European Stars Equity BP SEK
Tundra Sustainable Frontier Fund A SEK
